languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, эти три офицера отвечают за расследование. Капитан Кляйн — ветеран, подавивший не один бунт мутантских выродков в колониях. Капитан Джиневри юна, но уже предотвратила не один саботаж черни на борту. Капитан Хротко умел в дознании и умеет держать чернь в благоговении и страхе".

"Lord Captain, the three officers before you have been tasked with conducting the investigation. The first, Captain Klein, is a veteran with a record of quelled uprisings of mutant abominations in the colonies. Captain Jinevri is young, but she has already pre-empted several mutinies among the ship's rabble. Lastly, there is Captain Hrotko. His interrogation skills deserve credit, and he knows how to instil fear and respect firmly in the minds of the riffraff."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, эти три офицера отвечают за расследование. Капитан Кляйн — ветеран, подавивший не один бунт мутантских выродков в колониях. Капитан Джиневри юна, но уже предотвратила не один саботаж черни на борту. Капитан Хротко умел в дознании и умеет держать чернь в благоговении и страхе".

Jinevra is young, but she has already pre-empted several mutinies among the ship's rabble. Hrotko's skills in interrogation are impressive, and he knows how to put fear and respect firmly in the minds of the riffraff."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les trois officiers ici présents ont été chargés de l'enquête. Le premier, le capitaine Klein, est un vétéran expérimenté dans la répression des révoltes d'abominations hérétiques au sein des colonies. Quant à la capitaine Jinevri, elle a beau être encore jeune, elle a déjà étouffé dans l'œuf plusieurs mutineries ourdies par le petit personnel du vaisseau. Pour finir, le capitaine Hrotko est passé maître dans l'art des interrogatoires, et il sait mieux que quiconque comment imposer le respect et la terreur à la populace. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the three officers before you have been tasked with conducting the investigation. The first, Captain Klein, is a veteran with a record of quelled uprisings of mutant abominations in the colonies. Captain Jinevri is young, but she has already pre-empted several mutinies among the ship's rabble. Lastly, there is Captain Hrotko. His interrogation skills deserve credit, and he knows how to instil fear and respect firmly in the minds of the riffraff."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, los tres oficiales que tiene delante están encargados de realizar la investigación. El primero, el capitán Klein, es un veterano con un historial de rebeliones de aberraciones mutantes aplastadas en las colonias. La capitana Jinevri es joven, pero ya ha evitado varios amotinamientos entre la plebe de la nave. Por último, tenemos al capitán Hrotko. Sus capacidades como interrogador son dignas de alabanza, y sabe cómo infundir miedo y respeto en las mentes de la turba».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the three officers before you have been tasked with conducting the investigation. The first, Captain Klein, is a veteran with a record of quelled uprisings of mutant abominations in the colonies. Captain Jinevri is young, but she has already pre-empted several mutinies among the ship's rabble. Lastly, there is Captain Hrotko. El primero, el capitán Klein, es un veterano con un historial de rebeliones de aberraciones mutantes aplastadas en las colonias. Sus capacidades como interrogador son dignas de alabanza, y sabe cómo infundir miedo y respeto en las mentes de la turba».

languages.text: “舰长大人，您面前的三位军官是这场调查的主要负责人。这位是克莱因上尉，他是个老兵，曾在殖民地镇压过邪恶变种人的暴乱；这位是杰尼娃上尉，她虽然很年轻，但已经多次采取了干预手段，提前预防了船员叛乱；最后这位是赫洛卡上尉，他的审讯技巧相当出色，非常擅长在底层民众之中灌输恐惧与敬畏。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the three officers before you have been tasked with conducting the investigation. The first, Captain Klein, is a veteran with a record of quelled uprisings of mutant abominations in the colonies. Captain Jinevri is young, but she has already pre-empted several mutinies among the ship's rabble. Lastly, there is Captain Hrotko. His interrogation skills deserve credit, and he knows how to instil fear and respect firmly in the minds of the riffraff."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您面前的三位军官是这场调查的主要负责人。这位是克莱因上尉，他是个老兵，曾在殖民地镇压过邪恶变种人的暴乱；这位是杰尼娃上尉，她虽然很年轻，但已经多次采取了干预手段，提前预防了船员叛乱；最后这位是赫洛卡上尉，他的审讯技巧相当出色，非常擅长在底层民众之中灌输恐惧与敬畏。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン。あなたの前にいる3人の士官が調査を任されています。一人目のクライン船長は、植民地でのミュータント・忌まわしきものの反乱を鎮圧した実績を持つベテランです。ジネヴリ船長は若いですが、すでに船内の暴徒の反乱を何度か未然に防いでいる。三人目はフロトコ船長です。彼の尋問の腕前は誰にも引けを取らず、ならず者たちの心に恐怖と尊敬をしっかりと植え付ける術を持っています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the three officers before you have been tasked with conducting the investigation. The first, Captain Klein, is a veteran with a record of quelled uprisings of mutant abominations in the colonies. Captain Jinevri is young, but she has already pre-empted several mutinies among the ship's rabble. Lastly, there is Captain Hrotko. His interrogation skills deserve credit, and he knows how to instil fear and respect firmly in the minds of the riffraff."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン。あなたの前にいる3人の士官が調査を任されています。一人目のクライン船長は、植民地でのミュータント・忌まわしきものの反乱を鎮圧した実績を持つベテランです。ジネヴリ船長は若いですが、すでに船内の暴徒の反乱を何度か未然に防いでいる。三人目はフロトコ船長です。彼の尋問の腕前は誰にも引けを取らず、ならず者たちの心に恐怖と尊敬をしっかりと植え付ける術を持っています」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die drei Offiziere vor Euch haben den Auftrag erhalten, die Untersuchung auszuführen. Der erste, Captain Klein, ist ein Veteran, der in den Kolonien schon mehrfach Aufstände von mutierten Abscheulichkeiten niedergeschlagen hat. Captain Jinevra ist jung, hat jedoch bereits mehrere Meutereien im Pöbel des Schiffs verhindert. Und zuletzt haben wir Captain Hrotko. Er versteht sich perfekt auf die Kunst des effektiven Verhörs, und er weiß, wie man dem niederen Pack Furcht und Respekt einimpft."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the three officers before you have been tasked with conducting the investigation. The first, Captain Klein, is a veteran with a record of quelled uprisings of mutant abominations in the colonies. His interrogation skills deserve credit, and he knows how to instil fear and respect firmly in the minds of the riffraff."

Er versteht sich perfekt auf die Kunst des effektiven Verhörs, und er weiß, wie man dem niederen Pack Furcht und Respekt einimpft."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, huzurunuzdaki üç subaya soruşturmayı yürütme vazifesi verildi. Subaylardan ilki Komutan Klein, kendisi kolonilerdeki menfur mutant isyanlarını bastırma rekorunu elinde tutan kıdemli bir subaydır. İkinci subayımız Komutan Jinevri, genç olsa da geminin ayaktakımı içinde çıkan birçok başkaldırıya hâlihazırda engel olmuştur. Son subayımız ise Komutan Hrotko. Sorgu yetenekleri takdire şayandır. Alt tabakadaki insanların yüreklerine korku, zihinlerine hürmet işlemeyi iyi bilir."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the three officers before you have been tasked with conducting the investigation. The first, Captain Klein, is a veteran with a record of quelled uprisings of mutant abominations in the colonies. Captain Jinevri is young, but she has already pre-empted several mutinies among the ship's rabble. Lastly, there is Captain Hrotko. His interrogation skills deserve credit, and he knows how to instil fear and respect firmly in the minds of the riffraff."
